name: deep-photo-styletransfer
description: Code and data for paper "Deep Photo Style Transfer": https://arxiv.org/abs/1703.07511

name: OpenFace
description: OpenFace – a state-of-the art tool intended for facial landmark detection, head pose estimation, facial action unit recognition, and eye-gaze estimation.

name: PRMLT
description: Matlab code of machine learning algorithms in book PRML

name: vrn
description: :man:  Code for "Large Pose 3D Face Reconstruction from a Single Image via Direct Volumetric CNN Regression"

name: DeepLearnToolbox
description: Matlab/Octave toolbox for deep learning. Includes Deep Belief Nets, Stacked Autoencoders, Convolutional Neural Nets, Convolutional Autoencoders and vanilla Neural Nets. Each method has examples to get you started.
